element.name: 911 EMS Call Center Volume per Year
element.definition: The number of 911 calls received by the call center during the last calendar year.
element.v3Comment: This statistical information is associated with the EMS Agency's specific EMS Agency Number (dAgency.02). A value should be associated with each with (dAgency.15) Statistical Calendar Year.

asserts.assert: When 911 EMS Call Center Volume per Year has a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting), it should be empty.

When 911 EMS Call Center Volume per Year is empty, it should have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting, if allowed for the element), or it should be omitted (if the element is optional).
